name: Asteroid Hater WIP
body:
### Asteroid Hater Work-in-progress

This is a fork of the Asteroid Hater HTML5 game (developed for the Games.com Hackathon) meant for exploring secondary ideas to improve game mechanics and cross-browser experiences, and to explore related extensions including integration with 3rd party services and re-packaging for mobile markets
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
